Reviews.Title: Best Camera ever.
Reviews.Author: Ken Clifton "Wildcat"
Reviews.Content: The package was delivered on time.  I thought I had an issue with the camera focusing.  The issue was me - not the camera, but the seller was willing to accept a return if needed.The only negative is the package says spare EN-EL15 battery- but the spare battery was not a Nikon battery.I would buy from them again.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 55-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Battery Charger +
<7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <10> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<11> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body with 55-300mm Lens + 64GB Card + Battery & Charger + Case + Flash + Filter + Tripod + Accessory Kit
